title: The Jamestown story
creator_credit: Karl Schiffman, Douglas Leiterman, Philip S. Hobel and Document Associates
brief_description: Focuses on Jamestown, a community with a history of strikes and labor troubles. Discusses an innovative program of labor management and co-operation that brought Jamestown back from the edge of economic disaster. Includes interviews with workers on the shop floor as well as managers.
